text:
:reactjs: *React Modules  X  HubL Modules* :sprocket:

All CMS Starter, Pro, and Enterprise customers can now use server-side React to build modules alongside existing HubL modules!

To get started opt-in via <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/design-manager/settings|Design Manager settings> and check out the <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-block-examples|example projects.>

Join <#C04AY1H2204|cms-react> if you have any questions.
